name: PROJECT XINATRA
description: PROJECT XINATRA is an action game inspired in the old classic arcade games. You will remember those classics games while you are killing hordes of enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP / Vista / 7 Processor: Dual Core a 2 GHz (Intel Core 2 Duo o superior, AMD Athlon X2 o superior) Memory: 1 MB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800 / AMD Radeon HD 2900 or upper DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: XP / Vista / 7 Processor: Dual Core a 2 GHz (Intel Core 2 Duo o superior, AMD Athlon X2 or upper) Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800 / AMD Radeon HD 2900 o superior DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space
